Class-Ranger 20 -- Female Skilled Heritage Human Ranger: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 19 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 40 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Favored Terrain (Plains): +10 Speed
Fleet: +5 Speed
Favored Terrain (Aquatic): Moves normally through underwater difficult terrain/Has a 40' swim Speed
Favored Terrain (Arctic): Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by ice and snow without a need to Balance
Favored Terrain (Desert): Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by sand without a need to Balance
Favored Terrain (Forest): Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by forest/Has a 40' climb Speed
Favored Terrain (Mountain): Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by mountains/Has a 40' climb Speed
Favored Terrain (Plains): Moves normally over difficult terrain in plains
Favored Terrain (Sky): Moves normally through difficult terrain in the sky/Has a 40' fly Speed
Favored Terrain (Swamp): Moves normally over greater difficult terrain caused by bogs
Favored Terrain (Underground): Moves normally over difficult terrain underground/Has a 40' climb Speed
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain
Terrain Master: Can train for 1 hr to make current terrain favored until spending a day away from it
Ultimate Skirmisher: Moves normally over difficult, greater difficult, and hazardous terrain
Wild Stride: Moves normally over non-magical difficult terrain

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
General Feats: 5 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Hunter's Edge: 1 selection
Ranger Feats: 11 selections
Ranger Key Ability: 1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Halfling): May take Halfling ancestry feats
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion that gains Hunt Prey and Flurry, Precision, and Outwit effects
Favored Terrain (Arctic): Can survive on 1/10 normal food and water
Favored Terrain (Desert): Can survive on 1/10 normal food and water
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has a choice of specialization
Perception: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Skill Modifiers:
Absalom Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Diplomacy: +4 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Accounting Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Games Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Hunting Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +26 (charisma; trained) Stealth: +30 (dexterity; master)
Athletics: +4 (strength; untrained) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Circus Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +32 (wisdom; legendary) Thievery: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +30 (intelligence; master) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Deception: +30 (charisma; master) Performance: +4 (charisma; untrained)
Languages: Abyssal; Celestial; Common; Halfling; Ignan; Orcish
Skill Notes:
Incredible Senses: Perception Legendary
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Absalom Lore): Skill Trained (Absalom Lore)
Skill Training (Accounting Lore): Skill Trained (Accounting Lore)
Skill Training (Circus Lore): Skill Trained (Circus Lore)
Skill Training (Games Lore): Skill Trained (Games Lore)
Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Ubiquitous Snares: Has increased Snare Specialist effects
Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Assurance (Absalom Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Absalom Lore checks
Assurance (Games Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Games Lore checks
Assurance (Religion): Can take an automatic 32 on Religion checks
Assurance (Survival): Can take an automatic 38 on Survival checks
Camouflage: Can use Hide and Sneak in natural terrain without cover
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures when using Aid with expert skills are successes
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 4x normal Speed
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed/Can Track without hourly Survival checks
Hazard Finder: +1 Perception to find traps/Automatically attempts Search to find traps
Hunt Prey: (1) Gives +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track a designated creature until next daily prep
Lightning Snares: Can craft a trap with 1 action
Master Monster Hunter: Can use Nature to Recall Knowledge to identify any creature
Masterful Hunter: With master proficiency, gains +4 Perception to Seek hunted prey, +4 Survival to Track hunted prey, and +4 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks on hunted prey
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with hunted prey
Powerful Snares: Created snares have a DC of at least 40
Quick Snares: Can prepare snares with 3 actions
Sense The Unseen: (R) Makes undetected foes hidden after a failed Seek
Shadow Hunter: Has continuous concealment from foes other than hunted prey in natural surroundings
Snare Crafting: Can use Crafting to create snares and knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Snare Specialist: Knows the formulas for 6 snares; may prepare 12 each day without using resources
Stealthy Companion: Companion gains benefits of Camouflage, and an ambusher companion gains an increase in Stealth rank
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Swift Tracker: Can Track at full Speed without hourly Survival checks/Can perform other exploration activities while tracking
To The Ends Of The Earth: Can follow hunted prey across any distance
Trackless Step: Has continuous benefits of the Cover Tracks action while moving at full Speed in natural terrain
Warden's Guidance: While observing hunted prey, ally failures and critical failures to Seek prey are successes
Warden's Step: Can include allies in an Avoid Notice action in natural terrain
Wild Empathy: Can use Diplomacy with animals to Make An Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (4 max); master) Class DC: Ranger: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Light Pick (+30 1d4+4 P [Crit d8]; strength; master); Longbow (+30 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R200'; dexterity; master); Pick (+30 1d6+4 P [Crit d10]; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Shot: Doubles ranged weapon increments
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Legendary Monster Hunter: Has increased Monster Hunter effects
Masterful Companion: Gives companion Masterful Hunter effects vs. hunted prey
Masterful Hunter: Class Master (Ranger)
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Ranger Expertise: Class Expert (Ranger)
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Second Skin: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Expertise (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Master (Sawtooth Saber)
Unconventional Weaponry (Sawtooth Saber): Weapon Familiarity (Sawtooth Saber)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Companion's Cry: Can use 2 actions for Command an Animal to give companion an additional action
Crossbow Ace: Crossbow inflicts +2 HP damage on hunted prey or immediately after reloading; a simple crossbow also increases its damage die by 1 step
Deadly Aim: (1) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty vs. hunted prey inflicts +8 HP damage
Disrupt Prey: (R) Makes a melee Strike on hunted prey within reach that uses a manipulate or move action or leaves a square while moving; success disrupts the action
Distracting Shot: Critical or double hit on hunted prey inflicts flat-footed for 1 rd
Double Prey: Can use Hunt Prey on 2 targets
Favored Enemy: Can use Hunt Prey with chosen creature type as a free action during initiative
Flurry: Reduces multiple attack penalties vs. hunted prey to -3 and -6, or -2 and -4 with an agile weapon
Greater Distracting Shot: Ranged hit on hunted prey inflicts flat-footed for 1 rd, or until the end of the next turn on a critical success or double hit
Hazard Finder: +1 Armor Class vs. traps
Hunt Prey: (1) Suffers no distance penalty for ranged Strikes in the 2nd range increment vs. a designated creature until next daily prep
Hunted Shot: (1) Makes 2 ranged Strikes against hunted prey once per rd
Hunter's Aim: (2) +2 ranged Strike ignores concealment of hunted prey
Impossible Flurry: (3) While wielding 2 weapons, makes 3 melee Strikes at the maximum multiple attack penalty
Impossible Volley: (3) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty attacks all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Twin Riposte: Gives an additional reaction to make a Twin Riposte once per turn
Legendary Shot: Ignores 5 range increments when attacking hunted prey with a master proficiency weapon
Manifold Edge: Can use a different Hunter's Edge benefit with Hunt Prey
Master Monster Hunter: Monster Hunter effects take effect on a normal success
Masterful Hunter: Suffers no distance penalty when attacking hunted prey in the 3rd range increment of a ranged weapon with master proficiency/Reduces multiple attack penalties vs. hunted prey with master weapon proficiency to -2 and -4, or -1 and -2 with an agile weapon/+2 Armor Class vs. a hunt prey target with master armor proficiency/2nd and 3rd hits on hunted prey inflict +2d8 HP and +1d8 HP precision damage
Monster Hunter: Can use Recall Knowledge as part of Hunt Prey; critical success gives +2 attack to self and allies for 1 rd once per target per day
Monster Warden: Successful use of Monster Hunter also gives self and allies +2 Armor Class on next attack and +2 on next save vs. hunted prey
Nature's Edge: Foes suffer flat-footed vs. self in natural and snare-imposed difficult terrain
Outwit: +1 Armor Class vs. hunted prey
Penetrating Shot: (2) Strike affects both a target and a creature giving it lesser cover
Perfect Shot: (3) Ranged Strike on hunted prey inflicts maximum damage on success and ends turn
Precision: First hit on hunted prey each rd inflicts +3d8 HP precision damage
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Critical hits with a simple weapon, martial weapon, or unarmed attack vs. hunted prey inflict its critical specialization effect
Running Reload: (1) Reloads during a Stride, Step, or Sneak
Scout's Warning: (F) Gives allies +1 initiative
Second Skin: Can rest normally in light or medium armor
Second Sting: (1) Failed Strike against hunted prey with a weapon in a hand inflicts the non-dice damage of the weapon in the other
Shared Prey: Can share with an ally the benefits of Hunt Prey and Flurry, Outwit, or Precision on a single target
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Side By Side: Self and companion automatically flank a foe adjacent to both
Skirmish Strike: (1) Steps before or after a Strike
Snap Shot: Can use a ranged weapon during a reaction to Strike an adjacent creature
Swift Prey: Can use Hunt Prey as a free action at the beginning of a turn
Targeting Shot: (1) Ranged attack vs. hunted prey ignores cover and concealment
Triple Threat: Can use Hunt Prey with 3 targets, share 2-target Hunt Prey effects with 1 ally, or share single-target Hunt Prey effects with 2 allies
Twin Parry: (1) Parrying with a melee weapon in each hand gives +1 Armor Class until the start of the next turn, or +2 Armor Class if either weapon has the parry trait
Twin Riposte: (R) Twin Parry allows Striking or Disarming a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twin Takedown: (1) Makes a melee Strike with each hand against hunted prey once per rd
Warden's Boon: (1) Shares Hunt Prey and Hunter's Edge benefits with an ally for 1 rd
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +32 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Improved Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Iron Will: Save Expert (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Hazard Finder: +1 vs. trap effects
Improved Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures, and suffers half normal damage from failed Reflex saves
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Ultimate Skirmisher: Never triggers movement-triggered traps
Notes
Validation Errors:
